segments.text: This kitchen is a disgusting mess waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with filthy water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, soaking her shoe and the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate while standing in that slop—how nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is grubby-handed, digging into the cookie jar like an animal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool is teetering, probably covered in who-knows-what from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up looks like she's begging for crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets with cookies exposed to all this dampness—revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, making the inside filth stand out more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinet doors is just vile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those stacked dishes near the sink are at risk of getting soaked and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect and uncleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this sloppy, hazardous disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
